summary: Tested three fixes: 1) Order ID Input + Auto Sequence (ORD-0001 format), 2) POS Printing Long Blank Paper Fix, 3) Master QR Code Plain Text SKU Format. All backend APIs and frontend UI features working correctly.
passed_tests: ✅ Backend: GET /api/orders/next-order-id returns 200
✅ Backend: next_order_id format is ORD-XXXX (4 digits)
✅ Backend: /api/orders/next-order-id requires authentication
✅ Backend: POST /api/orders accepts custom order_id parameter
✅ Backend: POST /api/orders auto-generates ORD-XXXX if order_id not provided
✅ Backend: POST /api/orders auto-generates if order_id is empty string
✅ Backend: POST /api/orders auto-generates if order_id is null
✅ Backend: POST /api/orders rejects duplicate order_id with 400 error
✅ Backend: POST /api/orders converts order_id to uppercase
✅ Backend: Sequential order IDs increment correctly after each order
✅ Frontend: Create Order page has Order ID input field (data-testid='order-id-input')
✅ Frontend: Order ID auto-generates on page load (ORD-0002, ORD-0003...)
✅ Frontend: Generate Next button works (data-testid='generate-order-id-btn')
✅ Frontend: Custom Order ID can be entered manually
✅ Frontend: Helper text: 'Auto-generated or enter custom ID (must be unique)'
✅ Frontend: Picklist page shows Master Barcode section
✅ Frontend: QR code contains plain text SKUs (4 SKU entries for WIRE001 x1 + MCB001 x3)
✅ Frontend: QR description: 'Scan to Auto-Add Items to Billing - Each SKU scans as keyboard input'
✅ Frontend: Print CSS has @page size: 80mm auto
✅ Frontend: Print CSS has page-break-inside: avoid
✅ Frontend: Print CSS has page-break-after: avoid
✅ Frontend: Print CSS has margin: 0
✅ Mobile: Order ID input visible on mobile viewport
✅ Mobile: Generate Next button visible on mobile
✅ Mobile: Create Order workflow works on mobile
critical_code_review_comments: Minor React hydration warnings in console: <tr> cannot be child of <span> in AdminDashboard table - cosmetic issue, doesn't affect functionality
seed_data_creation: Created test orders during testing: ORD-0002 (WIRE001 x1, MCB001 x3), ORD-0003 (mobile test)
context_for_next_testing_agent:
Three features tested and verified working: 1) Order ID - now ORD-XXXX format (4-digit sequential), auto-generated on page load, 'Generate Next' button fetches next ID from API, custom ID allowed (converted to uppercase), duplicates rejected. 2) Print CSS - uses @page size: 80mm auto (dynamic height), no page breaks, margin: 0 for thermal POS. 3) QR Code - plain text format: #ORD-XXXX
SKU1
SKU1
SKU2 (SKU repeated for qty), for scanner keyboard emulation. Backend test file: test_order_id_qr_print_features.py

order_id_input_auto_sequence.details: Order ID field with ORD-XXXX format, auto-generated on load, Generate Next button, custom entry allowed, duplicates rejected

pos_printing_no_blank_paper.details: Print CSS uses @page size: 80mm auto, page-break-inside/after: avoid, margin: 0 - dynamic height for thermal POS

master_qr_code_plain_text.details:
QR contains plain text SKUs (one per line, repeated for qty), format: #ORD-XXXX
SKU1
SKU1
SKU2, for scanner keyboard input

mobile_responsiveness.details: Order ID input and Generate Next button work correctly on mobile viewport (390x844)
